abstract: Intel’s decision to defy European antitrust investigators raised questions about how to handle the remainder of the investigation.
snippet: Intel’s decision to defy European antitrust investigators raised questions about how to handle the remainder of the investigation.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS  A decision by Intel, the chip maker, to defy European antitrust investigators raised questions Wednesday about how the European Commission should handle the remainder of the investigation and discourage similar behavior.

headline.main: Europe Ponders Its Next Step in Intel Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Europe Ponders Its Next Step in Intel Inquiry
